channel.title: warm • cozy on courtside nyc
channel.description: Recent content in warm • cozy on courtside nyc

item.title: the waverly inn
item.description: thoughts can walk in no problem for late dinner

item.title: golden swan
item.description: thoughts old converted town house, multiple levels, full shower in one of the bathrooms, very cool bar on first floor is also great for a date rented out the entire top floor for work dinner, fanastic menu highlights sticky toffee pudding

item.title: bakerie
item.description: menu highlights sandwiches looked gas

item.title: jolene
item.description: thoughts truly some of the kindest staff

item.title: hudson clearwater
item.description: thoughts private dining room downstairs, great for birthday dinner

item.title: casino
item.description: thoughts there’s a cool bar in the basement menu highlights crispy baby artichokes nduja bread

item.title: cafe mogador
item.description: thoughts east village classic menu highlights amba (side sauce)

item.title: jac's on bond
item.description: thoughts make a res if you can, weeknights better than weekends imo everyone in there is cool and attractive and they know it

item.title: madeline's martini
item.description: thoughts great date spot menu highlights french martini

item.title: hilot
item.description: thoughts great date spot bar tender asked for our flavor profile so he could make us something off menu. i told him i liked tequila and ginger, got a riff on a mule that was one of the best cocktails i’ve ever had!

item.title: ariari
item.description: thoughts inspired by the port city of busan korean comfort food that’s seafood heavy menu highlights yook-hoe - beef tartare fried softshell crab

item.title: yellow rose
item.description: thoughts the tacos are delicious, but the apps are the real star of the show menu highlights lonestar beer queso is a must sheet cake

item.title: bobo
item.description: thoughts bar downstairs also cute for drinks or a date

item.title: el quijote
item.description: thoughts they have a basement wine cellar you can rent out for a special event or birthday dinner! such a cool space. old and historic, but also trendy and cool. bar scene is lit. also can easily walk through the double doors at the back of the restaurant and head into the lobby bar at hotel chelsea for a post-dinner drink. menu highlights

item.title: mino brasserie
item.description: thoughts came here with a party of 8 menu highlights steak sandwich

item.title: kings co imperial
item.description: see locations thoughts great patio action in williamsburg location menu highlights egg rolls were gas

item.title: frenchette
item.description: thoughts they have cozy booths that are great for a party of 4-6 menu highlights sourghdough pancake (only served for brunch on saturdays & sundays)

item.title: freeman's
item.description: thoughts they have not one but two different back rooms to host your birthday brunch parents love this place rustic, farm house, ski lodge chic menu highlights spinach artichoke dip

item.title: dante
item.description: thoughts best cocktail bar in new york. menu highlights martini negroni

item.title: le fournil
item.description: thoughts feels like you could be in the french countryside

item.title: fiaschetteria pistoia
item.description: thoughts wine changes all the time, they bring your choices out in a carrier, very fun post dinner espresso hits

item.title: pig and khao
item.description: menu highlights brussel sprouts sleeper hit.

item.title: cafe cluny
item.description: thoughts odds of d list celebrity sighting are high. bring your friend who’s cosplaying as an influencer while you enjoy a delicious burger. two birds one stone. menu highlights fries are excellent.
